power.title: Advancing Poise
power.fluff: Your words allow your friends to drive back your enemies

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another warlord at-will attack, you gain the following effects:

section.name: Tactician's Command:
section.text: If the target ally hits with a melee attack, her or she can push the target 1 square. If the attack already pushes, increase the push by 1 square instead.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When you hit an enemy with a melee attack, allies in your warlord's aura gain a +1 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy with attacks that push, pull, or slide.

power.title: Brash Poise
power.fluff: Your bold tactics leave you open to an enemy's counterattack, but that's just what you want

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another warlord at-will attack, your gain the following effects:

section.name: Tactician's Command:
section.text: If the target enemy has made an attack against you since the end of your previous turn, the target ally gains combat advantage for the attack.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: If an enemy critically hits you and deals damage, all allies in the aura gain combat advantage on their first attack against that enemy before the start of the enemy's next turn.

power.title: Bull's-Eye Poise
power.fluff: By making a ranged attack against a target, you guide your allies' ranged attack to strike true

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another warlord at-will attack, you gain the following effects:

section.name: Tactician's Command:
section.text: The target ally gains a bonus to the damage roll if he or she makes a ranged attack. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2 + your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 4 + your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When you make a ranged attack, until the end of your next turn, your allies in your warlord's aura gain a +1 power bonus to ranged attack rolls against that target.

power.title: Doubleteam Poise
power.fluff: Under your guidance your allies combine their efforts

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another warlord at-will attack, you gain the following effects:

section.name: Tactician's Command:
section.text: The target ally can shift 2 squares either before or after making the attack. He or she must end the shift adjacent to either you or an ally.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When you miss all targets of an attack, you can choose an ally in your warlord's aura. The first attack that the chosen ally makes against any target of the missing attack gains a +2 power bonus to the attack roll. This attack must come before the end of the chosen ally's next turn.
Also, you and allies in the aura gain a +1 bonus to AC and Will while adjacent to an ally.

power.title: Furious Poise
power.fluff: Your ferocious attack inspires your allies to match your fervor

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another warlord at-will attack, you gain the following effects:

section.name: Tactician's Command:
section.text: If you are bloodied, the target ally's attack deals additional damage equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2 + your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.
If the target ally is bloodied, he or she gains a +2 bonus to the attack roll.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: Each time you hit an enemy, all allies in the aura add one-half your Intelligence modifier or one-half your Wisdom modifier to their first melee damage roll against that enemy before the end of your next turn.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 2 + your Intelligence modifier or your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Mobility Poise
power.fluff: Your encouragement allows your allies to move that one step further towards triumph

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another warlord at-will attack, you gain the following effects:

section.name: Tactician's Command:
section.text: The target ally can move his or her speed, and can split this movement before and after the attack in any combination.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When an ally in your warlord's aura uses a power that allows them to move or shift, including charging, or one of your powers allows an ally to move or shift, the distance increases by 1 square.

power.title: Overwhelming Tide Poise
power.fluff: You direct your allies to attack your enemies relentlessly, like an incoming tide

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another warlord at-will attack, you gain the following effects:

section.name: Tactician's Command:
section.text: If the target ally's attack hits, until the end of your next turn allies in your warlord's aura gain a +2 bonus to charge attack rolls against the target enemy.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When you hit an enemy with an attack, until the end of your next turn allies in your warlord's aura gain a bonus to damage rolls when they charge that enemy. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2 + your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 4 + your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Rousing Poise
power.fluff: Your presence inspires confidence in your allies, allowing them to persevere longer

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another warlord at-will attack, you gain the following effects:

section.name: Tactician's Command:
section.text: If the target ally's attack hits, he or she gains temporary hit points equal to your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier.

If the target ally is bloodied or the attack scores a critical hit, he or she can choose to regain the same number of hit points instead. If the ally does, his or her attack gains the Healing keyword.
On a miss, the number of temporary hit points gained or hit points regained is halved.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 3 + your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier temporary hit points gained or hit points regained.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 + your Wisdom modifier or Charisma modifier temporary hit points gained or hit points regained.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When an ally in your warlord's aura regains hit points and is no longer bloodied because of it, they gain a +1 bonus to their first attack roll before the end of their next turn. This bonus is immediately lost if the ally becomes bloodied again.

If you hit with an attack, until the end of your next turn, allies in the aura instead gain a +1 bonus to their next attack roll whenever they spend a healing surge, and a +2 bonus whenever they regain hit points and are no longer bloodied because of it.

power.title: Viper's Poise
power.fluff: Your tactical eye gives an ally a chance to strike despite the care shown by the enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another warlord at-will attack, you gain the following effect:

section.name: Tactician's Command:
section.text: If the target ally's attack hits, until the end of your next turn, the target enemy provokes an opportunity attack from that ally when it shifts.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: Allies in your warlord's aura gain a bonus to damage rolls with triggered attacks, including opportunity attacks. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 3 + your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 6 + your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Wolf Pack Poise
power.fluff: Step by step, you and your team surround and overwhelm the enemy

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Until the end of the encounter or until you use another warlord at-will attack, you gain the following effects:

section.name: Tactician's Command:
section.text: The target ally can shift 1 square before making the attack.
If the target ally flanks the target enemy, his or her attack deals additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: 2 + your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: 4 + your Intelligence modifier or Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Warlord's Aura:
section.text: When you hit an enemy with a melee attack, that enemy counts as flanked when you and one ally, or two allies, are adjacent to it. This lasts until the start of your next turn.
You and your allies in the aura gain combat advantage against enemies that are flanked by your or any of your allies.
